channel.title: Where can I?
channel.description:
Take some online courses, I am too tired for school.
I don't want to fall behind so what are some good online courses i am a tenth grader You know I almost fall asleep in every class, I never get a low test score and i am one of the top students But I need Improvements, solid ones

item.title: Where can I?
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:5, topic:431291”]@Stupit, I’m enrolled in Florida Virtual School and I love it to be honest.
I can do my work whenever I want.
I can speed up the pace at which my semester goes by, for example I could do a whole semesters work in a week.
I can listen to music, play Runescape, cheat on assigned work, never have a bed time curfew, and the possibility of me actually failing a semester is really low unless somehow I bomb the exams and I still have a great social life because I go out every weekend and I can go on vacations without having to worry about missing school and making up grades.

Anyways, if you live in Florida go to the website, FLVS.net[/quote]
I live in Newyork D:

Read full topic

item.title: Where can I?
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:5, topic:431291”]@Stupit, I’m enrolled in Florida Virtual School and I love it to be honest.
I can do my work whenever I want.
I can speed up the pace at which my semester goes by, for example I could do a whole semesters work in a week.
I can listen to music, play Runescape, cheat on assigned work, never have a bed time curfew, and the possibility of me actually failing a semester is really low unless somehow I bomb the exams and I still have a great social life because I go out every weekend and I can go on vacations without having to worry about missing school and making up grades.

Anyways, if you live in Florida go to the website, FLVS.net[/quote]
It may be different in Florida since I live in Canada.

Read full topic

item.title: Where can I?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

@Stupit, I’m enrolled in Florida Virtual School and I love it to be honest.
I can do my work whenever I want.
I can speed up the pace at which my semester goes by, for example I could do a whole semesters work in a week.
I can listen to music, play Runescape, cheat on assigned work, never have a bed time curfew, and the possibility of me actually failing a semester is really low unless somehow I bomb the exams and I still have a great social life because I go out every weekend and I can go on vacations without having to worry about missing school and making up grades.

Anyways, if you live in Florida go to the website, FLVS.net

Read full topic

item.title: Where can I?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:3, topic:431291”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=533967.msg3903496#msg3903496 date=1327979385]

Take some online courses, I am too tired for school.

I don’t want to fall behind so what are some good online courses i am a tenth grader
You know I almost fall asleep in every class, I never get a low test score and i am one of the top students
But I need Improvements, solid ones

I looked into this, and really unless your in isolated territory. (EX: Way the fuck out of school districts) It’s not worth it.
[/quote]
No I mean I want extra classes so I can make up what I slept through[/quote]
fuck school!

edit:
ask your teacher for extra work I guess

Read full topic
